name: This has to mean something right?
name_original: This has to mean something right?
description:
This game is my senior thesis, it is still in progress. This is the first playable upload, I am posting it online for my peers and professors to view, it is not polished yet.

The only consistent thing you have is yourself. That's a very scary fact for someone who is unstable and struggling with their sense of self. Being grounded and recovering are not easy things to do, but luckily there's always people  there who want to help you. At least you can hope they have good intentions, it is hard to trust anyone or anything when everything feels like it is falling apart. Can you fix your brain? Is it ever going to be easier?

The surreal and dissociative exploration of someone who is at their lowest, unable to tell what is dreams or reality and unable to trust their own perception.
